title:
On Infinite Series of Bessel functions of the First Kind: $\sum_
u J_{N
u+p}(x), \sum_
u (-1)^
u J_{N
u+p}(x)$. (arXiv:2211.01148v1 [math-ph] CROSS LISTED)
description: Infinite series of Bessel function of the first kind, $\sum_ u^{\pm\infty} J_{N u+p}(x)$, $\sum_ u^{\pm\infty} (-1)^ u J_{N u+p}(x)$, are summed in closed form. These expressions are evaluated by engineering a Dirac comb that selects specific sequences within the Bessel series.
dc:creator: Suk Hyun Sung, Robert Hovden
